    • addProduct

      public void addProduct​(java.sql.Connection conn, Product product) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Adds a product to the database.
      Parameters:
      conn - the connection used for the database
      product - the product to be added
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if there are any SQL errors

    • updateProduct

      public void updateProduct​(int productId, double salePrice) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Updates the sale price of a product.
      Parameters:
      productId - the ID of the product
      salePrice - the new sale price
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if there are any SQL errors

    • loadProducts

      public java.util.List<Product> loadProducts​(java.sql.Connection conn) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Loads the products (with the sale price equal to null) from the database.
      Parameters:
      conn - the connection used by the database
      Returns:
      a list of products
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if there are any SQL errors
